questions.question_text: An employee who was dismissed did not return company-issued equipment. Which of the following is the most important information the IT department needs to give to the legal department?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The serial number is associated with an asset tag. The asset tag can be altered or removed easier than the SN.

Selected Answer: D
I think the asset tag is correct because it proves that the company owns the asset.

Selected Answer: C
df -h Displays storage capacity for filesystems or partitions

The Official CompTIA Server+ Study Guide (Exam SK0-005) page 123.

Selected Answer: C
C appears to be correct. Command will display file sizes in human readable format. 
Ref: https://www.linuxteck.com/df-command-in-linux-with-examples/

questions.question_text: A user cannot save large files to a directory on a Linux server that was accepting smaller files a few minutes ago. Which of the following commands should a technician use to identify the issue?

discussion.content: When you research server clustering, you frequently hear the terms failover and failback. Failover refers to the failure of the active service provider node and passive node's taking over of its responsibilities. At that point, the server that was the passive node becomes the active node. It services clients and handles the cluster’s duties. Once the original active node returns to service, you may set it to act as the new passive node, or you may shift the services back to it, causing it to take back its active node role and relegating the formerly passive server to its original role. The term failback refers to the service returning to the original active node.

questions.question_text: Ann, an administrator, is configuring a two-node cluster that will be deployed. To check the cluster's functionality, she shuts down the active node. Cluster behavior is as expected, and the passive node is now active. Ann powers on the server again and wants to return to the original configuration. Which of the following cluster features will allow Ann to complete this task?

choices.A: Revert any patches or updates on the server from the past 24 hours.
choices.E: Perform a quick backup of the system to prevent any further issues.
choices.C: Perform a root cause analysis and report the issue to management.
choices.D: Collect all logs from the system and review the actions the technician performed.
choices.B: Reproduce the issue in a test environment and confirm the database fails in the same manner.

questions.question_text: While a technician is troubleshooting a performance issue on a database server, users are disconnected from the database. An administrator is asked to intervene and restore access. Which of the following steps should the administrator take first?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
We need to know what the other tech could have done to have caused this/establish a theory of probable cause. (D) best describes the next best thing to do to resolve.

questions.question_text: Which of the following technologies best describes Hyper-V Replica?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Hyper-V Replica is a feature in Windows Server that helps businesses recover from disasters and maintain business continuity.
